MenuItem.title: MenuItem
MenuItem.description: Represents a dish or item on the menu.

id.description: Unique identifier for the menu item.

category.description: Category of the dish (e.g., appetizer, main course).

description.description: A short description of the dish.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image for the dish.

tags.description: Tags associated with the dish (e.g., vegetarian, spicy).

quantity.description: Indicates the available stock for the dish. A quantity > 0 means the item is available.

timestamp.description: Date and time when the order was placed.

status.description: Current status of the order (e.g., received, preparing, ready, completed).

Worker.title: Worker
Worker.description: Represents a kitchen worker or admin. The document ID for this collection should be the worker's unique login ID (e.g., 'WK001').

workerId.description: The Login ID. (e.g., "WK001", "AD101"). Should be unique and match the document ID.

name.description: Display name for the dashboard (e.g., "Chef Rahul").

role.description: Defines permissions and which portal the user sees.

isActive.description: Set to true if they are currently employed. Set to false to block access without deleting the record.

phone.description: In case the Admin needs to contact them urgently.

/menu_items/{menuItemId}.description: Stores information about each menu item. Only admins can create, update, or delete menu items.

/workers/{workerId}.description: Stores worker information. Used for authentication and assigning orders. The document ID must be the same as the 'workerId' field.

/workers/{workerId}/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores order information associated with a specific worker. Includes the `workerId` for authorization.
